name: Opensea Clone
description: I created an NFT marketplace with HTML, CSS, Typescript, Next.js, Thirdweb, and Firebase. Users can personalize accounts and trade NFTs with Metamask login. I improved my skills in blockchain and development, resulting in an intuitive UI. A valuable learning experience for me.

name: Weather App
description: I made a responsive Weather App with Typescript and React.js, using Openweather API and Suncalc to show local weather and time. With a custom background that changes according to current weather and time, I explored advanced topics such as parallax effect. Built with HTML, CSS, and Next.js.

name: Crypto Lottery
description: I built a responsive Weather App with Typescript, HTML, CSS, and Next.js, using Openweather API and Suncalc to adapt the UI to the user's local weather and time. With a custom background that changes based on these factors, I improved the user experience. The app lets users search for the weather in any city worldwide.

name: Tiles
description: Made a memory game using HTML, CSS, Typescript, and React.js with custom star explosion animation. Added local score screen to store user data without login. Demonstrates front-end dev skills, eager to build upon in future projects.
